Dear clients and Partners,

Today, we are delighted to announce that Triaset’s Brand Refresh initiatives will commence on the 1st of April, 2022. This has been a long time coming. While our name remains unchanged, our refreshed Brand Identity will modernise our brand and enhance our visibility in the ecosystem. We will surely see improvements in the areas of visual identity, personality, equity, communication and positioning. Our brand assets such as company logo, official corporate documentations and website will undergo necessary changes that are meant to bring about a breath of fresh air.

As you take notice to the changes in our branding, digital presence and new grooves, we certainly love to connect with you. That said, please feel free to reach out with any thoughts, requests or compliments at any time. Do not hesitate to text or call us at the same number and email or simply drop by our office. If you are a frequent patron of social media, kindly connect with us through LinkedIn and Facebook for exciting announcements and updates. For more detailed updates, please subscribe to our newsletter.

At the same time, we would like to take this opportunity to sincerely thank everyone for your continuous trust and support. Rest assured that this will not interrupt our operations and services. On that note, we look forward to providing you with excellent services along with intuitively elegant digital solutions that bring greater values and satisfactions.

Sincerely,
William Lim
CEO
